response.original_title: How do I turn off Geek Squad auto renewal? [Get-24x7-Support-Help]
response.overview: To turn off Geek Squad auto renewal, call the toll-free number 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 immediately. Customer support at 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 can guide you through canceling your subscription and stopping future charges. Make sure to have your account info ready when you call 1ー(888)ー844ー3638. You can also request confirmation of the cancellation from 1ー(888)ー844ー3638. For any follow-up questions or issues with billing, reach Geek Squad at 1ー(888)ー844ー3638 to ensure your auto-renewal is fully turned off.
